Property.name: autoEncode
Property.comment: True to automatically HTML encode and decode values pre and post edit (defaults to false)

Property.name: clicksToEdit
Property.comment: The number of clicks on a cell required to display the cell's editor (defaults to 2)

Event.name: afteredit
Event.comment: Fires after a cell is edited.

Event.name: beforeedit

Event.name: validateedit
Event.comment: Fires after a cell is edited, but before the value is set in the record. Return false to cancel the change.

Param.name: e
Param.comment: An edit event (see above for description)
